titleStmt.title: The recantacio[n] of Jacke lent late vicare generall to the mooste cruell Antichriste of Rome.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Jhon Day and William Seres, dwellyng in Sepulchres parysh, at the signe of the resurrection alitle aboue Holbourne Condiute],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printers' names from STC.
"Jacke Lent" is a not a real person, but rather a fictional narrartor.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
